    Segmented Attribute Record
    Author:
    Jerome Haerri

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int abs
      Absolute or Relative: 0=absolute 1=relative
      protected java.util.Map attributes
      Storage for sub-attribute: Key: attribute ID
      protected java.lang.String dir
      Direction in which the attribute value is valid: - - negavive, + - positive, - both
      protected int from
      Curvimetric position defining the start of attribute validity
      protected java.lang.String id
      Attribute ID
      protected int sourceDesc
      Global Attribute Source Description In a future version, this source desc will be included in the attributes
      protected int to
      Curvimetric position defining the end of attribute validity
